TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit FontStyle extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: A font style object.

remarks.para: A font style object.
This class represents a single font style which is a pair of weight value and slant value. Here are common font styles examples:
remarks.code: final FontStyle NORMAL = new FontStyle(FONT_WEIGHT_NORMAL, FONT_SLANT_UPRIGHT); final FontStyle BOLD = new FontStyle(FONT_WEIGHT_BOLD, FONT_SLANT_UPRIGHT); final FontStyle ITALIC = new FontStyle(FONT_WEIGHT_NORMAL, FONT_SLANT_ITALIC); final FontStyle BOLD_ITALIC = new FontStyle(FONT_WEIGHT_BOLD, FONT_SLANT_ITALIC);
remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 weight, valuetype Android.Graphics.Fonts.FontSlant slant) cil managed

Docs.summary: Create FontStyle with specific weight and italic

remarks.para: Create FontStyle with specific weight and italic

Value Name Android Definition
100 Thin FontStyle#FONT_WEIGHT_THIN
200 Extra Light (Ultra Light) FontStyle#FONT_WEIGHT_EXTRA_LIGHT
300 Light FontStyle#FONT_WEIGHT_LIGHT
400 Normal (Regular) FontStyle#FONT_WEIGHT_NORMAL
500 Medium FontStyle#FONT_WEIGHT_MEDIUM
600 Semi Bold (Demi Bold) FontStyle#FONT_WEIGHT_SEMI_BOLD
700 Bold FontStyle#FONT_WEIGHT_BOLD
800 Extra Bold (Ultra Bold) FontStyle#FONT_WEIGHT_EXTRA_BOLD
900 Black (Heavy) FontStyle#FONT_WEIGHT_BLACK
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
